translations.source: 17.2生产指导
translations.target: 17.2 Production Guidance

translations.source: 工厂全部投产后，根据需要，中钢设备可以派出工厂技术管理和关键岗位操作技术工人。全面指导和操作工厂，并在实际生产中培训哥伦比亚国的技术员和工人，尽快掌握技术和熟练操作，使工厂能稳定、连续、正常生产。
translations.target: 工厂全部投产后，根据需要，中钢设备可以派出工厂技术管理和关键岗位操作技术工人。全面指导和操作工厂，并在实际生产中培训哥伦比亚国的技术员和工人，尽快掌握技术和熟练操作，使工厂能稳定、连续、正常生产。

translations.source: 项目投产后，如果业主要求中钢设备工程师继续进行现场生产指导，中钢设备会根据业主的要求进行继续技术服务。
translations.target: After the project is put into production, if the owner requests Sinosteel Equipment engineers to continue on-site production guidance, Sinosteel Equipment will provide continued technical services according to the owner's requirements.

translations.source: 18 性能考核
translations.target: 18 Performance Assessment

translations.source: 18.1 性能考核指标
translations.target: 18.1 Performance Assessment Indicators

translations.source: 性能考核指标，如焦炭质量主要参数、炼焦周转时间等，双方协商确定。
translations.target: Performance assessment indicators, such as main coke quality parameters and coking cycle time, shall be determined through negotiation between both parties.

translations.source: 18.2 性能考核的主要条件
translations.target: 18.2 Main Conditions for Performance Assessment

translations.source: 1) 性能参数考核周期按照合同规定进行，一般情况性能保证测试自项目投产之日，3个月内产量达到设计参数标准，炼焦煤质量、电和水条件符合技术方案规定时，业主提出性能参数考核。对第一次考核达不到性能指标的进行第二次，第三次考核。考核时间每次间隔不超过1个月。项目投产之日起六个月内，越南Vinmetal炼焦煤、电、水等达不到考核的条件，视同考核通过。
translations.target: 1) 性能参数考核周期按照合同规定进行，一般情况性能保证测试自项目投产之日，3个月内产量达到设计参数标准，炼焦煤质量、电和水条件符合技术方案规定时，业主提出性能参数考核。对第一次考核达不到性能指标的进行第二次，第三次考核。考核时间每次间隔不超过1个月。项目投产之日起六个月内，越南Vinmetal炼焦煤、电、水等达不到考核的条件，视同考核通过。

translations.source: 2) 性能参数考核条件，炼焦煤所有质量指标、供电、供水等要符合本项目合同技术附件和基础设计的规定。
translations.target: 2) For performance parameter assessment conditions, all quality indicators of coking coal, power supply, water supply, etc. shall comply with the provisions of the contract technical annexes and basic design of this project.

translations.source: 3) 性能参数考核使用的检测设备需要越南Vinmetal提供，性能参数使用的设备安装位置需要越南Vinmetal和中钢设备协商确定，性能参数使用的设备精度需要越南Vinmetal和中钢设备共同校准、认可。如果越南Vinmetal提供不能提供检测设备，则该项性能参数视同考核通过。
translations.target: 3) 性能参数考核使用的检测设备需要越南Vinmetal提供，性能参数使用的设备安装位置需要越南Vinmetal和中钢设备协商确定，性能参数使用的设备精度需要越南Vinmetal和中钢设备共同校准、认可。如果越南Vinmetal提供不能提供检测设备，则该项性能参数视同考核通过。

translations.source: 4) 性能参数考核参加人员由越南Vinmetal和中钢设备组成，各方参加人员和工作分工考核时通过会议纪要确定。
translations.target: 4) The personnel participating in the performance parameter assessment shall consist of Vietnam Vinmetal and Sinosteel Equipment representatives. The participants and division of work from each party shall be determined through meeting minutes during the assessment.

translations.source: 5) 在性能考核验收进行前，将焦炉调火和焦炉车辆调整到符合性能考核的状态，包括焦炉的热工密封、车辆的备品备件及检修等。车辆要优先保证所考核焦炉的正常使用。
translations.target: 5) Before the performance assessment acceptance, the coke oven heating regulation and coke oven vehicles shall be adjusted to meet the performance assessment requirements, including the thermal sealing of coke ovens, spare parts and maintenance of vehicles, etc. Vehicles shall prioritize ensuring the normal use of the assessed coke ovens.

translations.source: 6) 按照焦炉串序以考核焦炉的3个装煤推焦生产周期的考核参数，作为性能考核指标参数。
translations.target: 6) The assessment parameters of 3 coal charging and coke pushing production cycles of the assessed coke oven shall be used as performance assessment indicator parameters according to the coke oven sequential order.

translations.source: 7) 如考核不合格的原因是由承包商造成，允许承包方进行整改，整改期限不超过2个月。整改结束后，对第一次考核不达标的性能考核指标进行重新考核。
translations.target: 7) If the cause of assessment failure is attributable to the contractor, the contractor shall be allowed to carry out rectification within a period not exceeding 2 months. After rectification, the performance assessment indicators that did not meet the standards in the first assessment shall be re-assessed.

translations.source: 8) 在考核期间，由于发包方装炉煤质量指标不符合考核所用煤装炉煤质量指标。水或电中断供应、发包方操作失误、或非承包方的原因，视同性能考核参数达标。
translations.target: 8) During the assessment period, if the coal charging quality indicators provided by the employer do not meet the required coal quality indicators for the assessment, or if water or electricity supply is interrupted, or due to the employer's operational errors, or reasons not attributable to the contractor, the performance assessment parameters shall be deemed as meeting the standards.

translations.source: 9) 考核开始及结束的清扫整理工作：
translations.target: 9) Cleaning and tidying work at the start and end of the assessment:

translations.source: a焦炉机焦侧平台、横梁、地面无煤粉和焦炭。
translations.target: a. The coke side platform, crossbeams, and ground of the coke oven machine shall be free of coal dust and coke.

translations.source: b熄焦车轨道内外侧无焦粒和焦炭。
translations.target: b. The inner and outer sides of the quenching car track shall be free of coke particles and coke.

translations.source: c熄焦塔地面和排水沟内无焦炭和焦粒。
translations.target: c. The quenching tower ground and drainage ditches shall be free of coke and coke particles.

translations.source: d固定推焦部位无焦粒和焦炭。
translations.target: d. The fixed coke pushing area shall be free of coke particles and coke.

translations.source: e晾焦台无焦粒和焦炭。
translations.target: e. The coke cooling platform shall be free of coke particles and coke.

translations.source: f运焦通廊、切焦楼、焦仓及周围无焦炭。
translations.target: f. The coke conveying corridor, coke cutting building, coke bins and surrounding areas shall be free of coke.
